title: Uhh... nerf Riven please? Like literally.
body:
OR at least nerf Death's Dance.

Just had a game where Riven could easily 1v5 the whole team because of Death's Dance. I'm not even exaggerating, once she got full build, she LITERALLY 1v5 our whole team. Even though she got CC'd so much, her mercury treads made her unstoppable.

I hope she gets a nerf because what I've just seen was absolutely disgusting, then she was taunting and saying we're all pussies and weak even though she was getting literally gaining 500 health per ability and aa she hit on us.

She almost won a 1v1 against a Lux under our fountain turret but it was Lux's bind that kept her away and died under turret then called Lux a pussy.

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/148671028/201128314?tab=overview

replies.body:
I do hate the whole DMG reduction meta we have going on right now in toplaners. {{champion:92}}  is really strong with this item, however the reason you weren't able to stop her was because you didn't have a good Duelist in your lineup and 1 Main dmg type ({{champion:99}}  {{champion:103}}  {{champion:50}}  - {{champion:81}} l partly) meaning that between {{item:3156}}  2 life steal items her shield CD and {{item:3111}} . You didn't have a single decent Dps to blow her away. The poor team comp you put together just simply got outscaled. {{champion:81}}  going blue build with such low Physical dmg on your team didn't help. All in all alot of things went wrong before we should talk about nerfing {{champion:92}} .
**However i do think {{item:3812}}  should be looked at. i don't think {{champion:92}}  should be balanced around the item**

TBH, now im not being a huge SOOK but, there is only a few number of riven players that you will meet that will be able to solo carry, im not saying she is a hard champ but only a few people will be able to face roll, either that or the mediocre rivens get fed by a below average player
They just re released champ riven ain't no way rito are going to nerf her and lose moneys
